Package flounder.visual

Contains classes for various visual effects.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstantDriver
    A driver that has a constant value.
    FadeDriver
    A driver that fades from start to end.
    KeyFrame
    A keyframe that has a value at a time.
    KeyFrameDriver
    A driver that interpolates between keyframes.
    LinearDriver
    A driver that linearly increases its value.
    SinWaveDriver
    A driver that uses a sine wave.
    SlideDriver
    A driver that slides to its destination using cosine interpolation.
    ValueDriver
    Represents a driver that changes over time.

Package flounder.visual Description

Contains classes for various visual effects.
